BusDK Design Document

Software Design Documents (SDD)

This section is the index for BusDK Software Design Documents. The SDD provides a single source of truth for design review and implementation traceability.

Single-page SDD

The consolidated view of goals, requirements, architecture, and key decisions:

  • BusDK Software Design Document (SDD) — single-page design spec

Module SDDs

Per-module Software Design Documents (requirements, interfaces, data design):

  • Modules (SDD) — list of all module SDDs with links to bus-init, bus-data, bus-accounts, and the rest

For end user CLI documentation in a man-page style, see the BusDK module CLI reference.
